aka: HP Lovecraft 生平及影响力

cast.name: 拉姆齐·坎贝尔 Ramsey Campbell
布莱恩·拉姆利 Brian Lumley
斯图尔特·戈登 Stuart Gordon

this_title: The Eldritch Influence: The Life, Vision, and Phenomenon of H.P. Lovecraft
trans_title: 可怕的感染力 - H.P. Lovecraft 现象
HP Lovecraft 生平及影响力
introduction: The Eldritch Influence looks at the world of literary outsider H.P. Lovecraft who posthumously infected a large number of artists, writers, mystics and fanatics with his wonderfully bleak worldview. Using passionate interviews and colorful commentary the film presents a picture of Lovecraft's life and thought through those he's touched and inspired. Featuring Lovecraft biographer S.T. Joshi, authors Ramsey Campbell, Neil Gaiman, Brian Lumley and filmmaker Stuart Gordon. Written by Shawn Owens
chinese_title: 可怕的感染力 - H.P. Lovecraft 现象
foreign_title: The Eldritch Influence: The Life, Vision, and Phenomenon of H.P. Lovecraft
